name: ParserTest
description: Unit tests for the Parser class, focusing on entity unescaping and UTF-8 parsing.

test_cases.name: unescapeEntities
test_cases.description: Tests the unescaping of HTML entities in a string.

test_cases.name: unescapeEntitiesHandlesLargeInput
test_cases.description: Tests the unescaping of HTML entities in a large input string.

test_cases.name: testUtf8
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of UTF-8 encoded input stream to ensure correct character representation.
